page.title: 20A Day In My Life
page.content: After school on Fridays I come home and do my homework. At 5.00 p.m. I go with my brother and Dad to play squash at the local squash courts. At 5.45 p.m. I get home and go out again at 6.15 p.m. to play football at the local club. There are 6 years in the club and I am in the under 13's. We play in the winter months and into early summer when we change to training. There are about 100 members in the club. After coming home at 7.15 p.m. I have dinner and watch T.V. Later at about 8.00 p.m. I sort out my collections of coins, stamps, rubber, badges and bookmarks. At about 10.00 p.m. I go to bed. James Pavey Form 1E Age: 12
